actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to require an annual report on participation in the Transition Assistance Program for members of the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.
short_title: Department of Defense Transition Assistance Program Oversight Improvement Act of 2017

summary.text:
Department of Defense Transition Assistance Program Oversight Improvement Act of 2017

This bill directs the Department of Defense to report to Congress annually on the participation of members of the Armed Forces in the Transition Assistance Program during the preceding year.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to require an annual report on participation in the Transition Assistance Program for members of the Armed Forces, and for other purposes.
